  • Constructor Details

    • Storage

      public Storage​(java.lang.Integer... amts)
      Create a storage object
      Parameters:
      amts - an array of integers that represents how many types of blocks, and how many items per each block.

  • Method Details

    • getPieceTypes

      public int getPieceTypes()
      Returns:
      how many block types we track

    • retrieve

      public boolean retrieve​(int piece)
      Retrieve a piece from the storage
      Parameters:
      piece - the piece type
      Returns:
      false if no available piece of the given type, true otherwise

    • getAvailable

      public int getAvailable​(int piece)
      Get a piece type availability for display purposes
      Parameters:
      piece - the piece type
      Returns:
      the number of available pieces of `piece`

    • clone

      public Storage clone() throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
      Create a deep clone of this object
      Returns:
      a new object that exposes the same block types and block availability as this
      Throws:
      java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - if any field is not cloneable
